version_description:
• Now you can request for money by generating and sharing your personalised QR code. No need to reveal bank details or even mobile number to get paid!
• The money gets transferred directly into your PayNow registered bank account when the payer pays using the OCBC Pay Anyone App

*You must be registered for PayNow to use this feature. Simply logon to OCBC Online or Mobile Banking to link your mobile number with your OCBC account

Paying for that plate of delicious chicken rice or hot spicy laksa at food centre just got easier! Forget the hassle of paying with cash, card with PIN or even managing mobile wallets.
Simply scan to pay via NETS QR code with OCBC Pay Anyone app using just a touch of your fingerprint at participating food centres.
It is the smarter way to pay.
Enhancement and other fixes

Introducing OCBC OneLook - we've updated the app to work with iPhone X's Face ID feature, so you can authorise QR code payments securely, with just a glance at your new iPhone X.

You can now use Apple's Camera app (iOS 11 and above) to read OCBC personalised QR codes to send money.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

Introducing the brand new OCBC Pay Anyone™ app - with a refreshed look and great new features!

Now pay anyone on your contact list via mobile number, Facebook ID or email, with just a glance (with OCBC OneLook on iPhone X) or your fingerprint (with OCBC OneTouch™ on iPhone 5s and above).

We've also added a feature that reveals your account balance(s) only when you need it.
- Fixed stability issues related to the QR code camera activation and mobile phone number lookup function.

"Hey Siri, pay John Tan $50."
Sit back and pay anyone with just your voice.
Bug fixes and security enhancement.
Fixes and enhancements

• Now you can simply scan to pay PayNow-registered businesses via QR code.
• Create your very own PayNow QR code to receive payment via any compatible bank apps.
Fixes and enhancements
Thanks for using OCBC Pay Anyone. We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes enhancements and minor bug fixes.
Thanks for using OCBC Pay Anyone. We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes minor bug fixes.

• Fixed session timeout issue while scanning a QR code.
• Minor user interface enhancements.
Fixes and enhancements
Minor UI enhancements and bug fixes.
Minor UI enhancements and bug fixes.
Fixed NETS QR purchase issue.
We have added an all new Split Bills feature that allows you to conveniently split the cost of meals and outings with your friends.
Now you can withdraw cash from over 700 OCBC ATMs islandwide with Pay Anyone app, no card needed!
Splitting cost with friends just got even easier. Pay Anyone "Split a Bill" now allows you to assign items to people and calculates the amount each person pays, including GST and service charge.
Bug fixes and minor UI enhancements

Unleash your rewards points potential. You can now access to STACK via your Pay Anyone App seamlessly. STACK is the first multi-partner loyalty platform in Singapore that allows you to optimise points earned across participating OCBC rewards programmes.
Now you can send up to a daily limit of S$5,000 securely via PayNow using mobile number or PayNow QR.
Bug fixes and minor UI enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements
UI enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements
Want to pay a PayNow merchant and do not have their QR code to scan? Worry not, you can now key in the UEN directly on Pay Anyone to make your payment!
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
This Chinese New Year, preserve tradition, go cashless and stay safe - all at the same time! Simply send e-Ang baos to your loved ones via the OCBC Pay Anyone™ app.
Bug fixes.
